q: a little re-org. And at first blush, Wall Street seemed to take the company at its word. Eric Schmidt , Larry Page , whatever. A sampling of analyst reactions: J.P. Morgan's Imran Khan : We think it is important to note that although the titles have changed, the core team remains the same. We think this new team structure makes a lot of sense and could result in faster decision making.
